abstract: Donald J Trump had turned brunt of his political attacks away from presidential rival Jeb Bush and onto Marco Rubio, underscoring Rubio's growing prominence in presidential race; Rubio, unlike Bush, seems capable of responding in kind.
lead_paragraph: After training his fire for much of the summer on former Gov. Jeb Bush, Donald J. Trump has found a new favorite Republican rival to taunt: Senator Marco Rubio of Florida.

headline.main: Donald Trump Sees in Marco Rubio a New Rival to Taunt, but Gets Plenty of Salvos in Return
headline.print_headline: Trump Sees in Rubio a New Rival to Taunt, but Gets Plenty of Salvos in Return

snippet: After training his fire for much of the summer on former Gov. Jeb Bush, Donald J. Trump has found a new favorite Republican rival to taunt: Senator Marco Rubio of Florida.
